      public void deleteCinema(int id, ICineplex cineplexManager)
      Description copied from interface: ICinema

    • createCinema

      public void createCinema(String code, String type)
      Description copied from interface: ICinema
      Create a new cinema in cinema manager. Performs check if size of code is 3. Performs check if type is valid.
      Specified by:
      createCinema in interface ICinema
      Parameters:
      code - of length 3
      type - ["Platinum", "Gold", "Silver"]
